knimeNode.name: HDF5 Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes groups, dataSets and attributes in an HDF5 File.

fullDescription.intro: This node writes groups, dataSets and attributes in an HDF5 File. ...

tab.name: Options

ul.li:
Selected file:
Select the path to the output file.

Overwrite file:
The option integrate manipulates an existing file.
The option overwrite overwrites an existing file.
The option rename creates a new file with an unused name if the file name is already assigned.

tab.option:
Specifies the configuration of the edits which the node should apply on the output file.
...

ul.li:
Save column properties:
Specifies if the node creates 2 additional attributes in each dataSet where some columns are modified.
One attribute, named 'knime.columnnames', contains the names of the columns in the input table.
The other attribute, named 'knime.columntypes', contains the original data types of the columns in the input table.

ports.inPort: Optional input table. May not be used if the node should only write attributes.
